data.author: Von R. Glitschka
data.quote: The client may be king, but he's not the art director.

data.author: Frank Capra
data.quote: A hunch is creativity trying to tell you something.

data.author: Steven Heller
data.quote: As a profession, graphic designers have been shamefully remiss or ineffective about plying their craft for social or political betterment.
